name: alacritty
title: Alacritty
description: Adds commands to control the Alacritty terminal emulator.
author: jose-elias-alvarez

commands.name: edit-file
commands.title: Edit File In Alacritty
commands.description: Edit the selected Finder file(s) in Alacritty using $EDITOR

commands.name: open-folder
commands.title: Open Folder In Alacritty
commands.description: Open an instance of Alacritty at the currently selected Finder folder(s) (or parent folder of the selected file)

commands.name: run-from-clipboard
commands.title: Run Command From Clipboard
commands.description: Run the current clipboard content as a shell command in Alacritty. Use at your own risk!

commands.name: run-from-selection
commands.title: Run Command From Selection
commands.description: Run the currently selected text as a shell command in Alacritty. Use at your own risk!

commands.name: change-theme
commands.title: Change Theme
commands.description: Switch to themes available in 'alacritty/alacritty-themes' repo

preferences.name: shellPath
preferences.title: Shell Path
preferences.description: Full path to shell executable used to run commands

preferences.name: configFilePath
preferences.title: Config File Path
preferences.description: Path to 'alacritty.toml' config file. Theme files will be placed in /themes directory of where this file is located.
